text: Isidro Pedraza Chávez (15 May 1959 – 10 November 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the PRD. He was the Senator from Hidalgo from 2012 to 2015. He also was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2006 to 2009. He was born in Jacala, Higalgo. Chávez died on 10 November 2020 in Pachua, Hidaldo from COVID-19, aged 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico
title: Isidro Pedraza Chávez
